    • Method Detail

      • createTable

        UpdateOperation createTable(String tableName,
                          Class<?> entityClass)
        Create a table with the name given and fields corresponding to the given class. If the table already exists and parameter ifNotExists is true, this is a no-op and false is returned. If the table doesn't exist, parameter ifNotExists is ignored, the table is created and true is returned.
        Parameters:
        ifNotExists - If true, will only create the table if it doesn't exist, else the create operation will be ignored and the method will return false.
        entityClass - The class whose fields determine the columns created.

      • alterTable

        com.google.common.base.Optional<UpdateOperation> alterTable(String tableName,
                                                          Class<?> entityClass,
                                                          boolean dropRemovedAttributeColumns)
        Add columns to the given table from the given class. If parameter dropRemovedAttributColumns is true, then this effectively becomes a synchronization operation between the class's fields and the existing table's columns.
        Parameters:
        entityClass - The class whose fields determine the columns added.
        dropRemovedAttributeColumns - Whether to drop columns that exist on the table but that don't have corresponding fields in the class. If true, this effectively becomes a synchronziation operation.
        optionsOrNull - The Execute Options Object if exists

      • validateTable

        String validateTable(String tableName,
                   Class<?> entityClass)
        Validate columns in the given table from the given class.
        Parameters:
        entityClass - The class whose fields determine the columns added.
        Returns:
        Returns alter table statement or null

      • dropTable

        UpdateOperation dropTable(String tableName)
        Drops the named table.
        Parameters:
        optionsOrNull - The Execute Options Object if exists

      • createIndexes

        IngestOperation createIndexes(String tableName,
                            Class<?> entityClass)
        Create all indexed annotated in entityClass
        Parameters:
        entityClass - The class whose fields determine the new table's columns.

      • alterIndexes

        IngestOperation alterIndexes(String tableName,
                           Class<?> entityClass)
        Create all indexed annotated in entityClass
        Parameters:
        entityClass - The class whose fields determine the new table's columns.

      • validateIndexes

        List<String> validateIndexes(String tableName,
                           Class<?> entityClass)
        Create all indexed annotated in entityClass
        Parameters:
        entityClass - The class whose fields determine the new table's columns.
        Returns:
        List of the cql statement to change indexes
